original_text: In the third year of the reign of King Belshazzar a vision appeared to me, Daniel, after that which appeared to me at the first.
korean_text: 나 다니엘에게 처음에 나타난 환상 후 벨사살 왕 제삼년에 다시 한 환상이 나타나니라

sentences.original_text: In the third year of the reign of King Belshazzar
a vision appeared to me, Daniel,
after that which appeared to me at the first.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 내가 맨 처음에 본 이상 후였습니다
